name: Tower Climbers (Lunautical)
description:
DON'T stop climbing
LAVA doesn't stop RISING
OUTLIVE your opponents

Tower Climbers is a competition with your friends (or foes, I won't judge you) to be the last climber standing! Climb through a random assortment of rooms endlessly generating, and most importantly, DON'T LET THE LAVA CONSUME YOU.

- Current Features -

  • Up to 8 players LOCAL
  • Random order of rooms making every run different
  • Last man standing wins, meaning it goes on till one person is left
  • Double jumping, wall grabbing, dashing, grappling, you name it!

- Planned Features -

  • More hazards
  • Improved movement system
  • Customization?
  • Music (DM me on Discord if you're interested, I'm looking for Chiptune)
  • Overhauled Sound Effects
  • More room templates
  • more MORE MORE!

And there's so much more I want to add to this. So please, give me feedback/ideas and follow development in my Discord Server! https://discord.gg/dzVdYHeFqv
